## prepareForFormBuilder() function

Prepares object for form builder, wraps each property in array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function prepareForFormBuilder(value: Object): {};
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | Object | Object which properties will be wrapped to array |

<b>Returns:</b>

{}
